TopicTitle: Stoke Space cargo bay in many diameters would be nice and useful addon to the KSP2 game.

Articles.Content:
This is what I mean if you don't know the Nova rocket design

PS. Modders are welcome to beat the devs in making this a reality! As I want to do it in KSP2 as well, so pretty please
I know you're trying to get some views on your videos, but gods, explain your idea with written words, I ain't watching anything just to get a basic concept.

7 hours ago, The Aziz said:

I know you're trying to get some views on your videos, but gods, explain your idea with written words, I ain't watching anything just to get a basic concept.

A video can be far more useful than words sometimes. It allows you to get a look at what someone means. A picture is worth a thousand words, so a video’s gotta be worth more… 

I do think it’s a good idea, it could be added officially in KSP2, but in KSP1, it could be modded in.

Edited October 19, 2023 by Kerballlistic07

On 10/19/2023 at 8:47 AM, The Aziz said:

I know you're trying to get some views on your videos, but gods, explain your idea with written words, I ain't watching anything just to get a basic concept.

It's not about the views, this is why I posted a video in the exact moment in time to provide how it works, not from the beginning so 15 seconds is enough to understand.

As well you can go to Stoke Space web page/YT channel to get more details.

PS. Watching this only for few seconds even harms the channel as algorytm thinks you don't like it.

Edited October 20, 2023 by Tazmaniak

On 10/19/2023 at 7:12 AM, Kerballlistic07 said:

A video can be far more useful than words sometimes. It allows you to get a look at what someone means. A picture is worth a thousand words, so a video’s gotta be worth more… 

Silly cliche is false dichotomy. Switching over to watching a video on a different site is disruptive to flow. Why would I want to spend 20 seconds with tab management, loading, ads, etc.? If it isn't important enough for the OP to even put a simple caption/comment/synopsis for it then that often indicates how much thought they put into the idea itself. Instead I could read another two posts.

Not everybody will see it that way, but if you want your comment to be read by a wide audience then it is best to present it in a format suitable for a wide audience with different reading/viewing styles.
Such a fairing would be cool. A way to implement it would be as an deployment option for your fairing. So you will have deployment regular and hinged deployment.
